daily_fact: Stay engaged with your community through local news and civic participation.
topline_md: New Yorkers are bracing for an immigration crackdown amid significant weather changes and increased traffic delays, while the city grapples with pressing social issues, including a recent tragic incident involving an abandoned infant and ongoing debates over housing policies and public safety.
